page.title: 13LILLESHALL CRICKET CLUB
page.content: This is the only private{Sports Club in our area.We spent an enjoyable afternoon being shown around by one of its founder members. The Club was{founded in 1900,}the{club {house was built in 1958}and 1966 an extension was added for social functions.In the club house they have a bar,a pool table,a dartsboard, toilets as well as changing rooms. Bigger events such as dances are held in the Memorial Hall.The cricket teams play their matches on Saturdays and friendly matches on Sundays.The coaching is done by 8 members of the club.They play in the{Border County {League}.The members provide all their own equipment as well as maintaining the grounds and running the club generally. {
